prod_short_desc: Discover the Lost Temple and help Lloyd win the Sword of Fire!
prod_long_desc:
Join the adventure with Lloyd and Jay, as they fight to get to the Sword of Fire before the snake villain. Featuring Jay's blue dragon, the snake villain's helicopter, the Lost Temple with lava ball, and other accessories. This LEGO® Juniors set offers an easy start to building with the LEGO brick for ages 4-7, with easy-to assemble models featuring iconic Ninja adventures. Includes 3 minifigures: Lloyd, Jay and a snake villain.
Build your own Lost Temple, complete with lava ball, swinging axe and spinning saw blade obstacles, gate that opens, blue dragon and accessories!
Includes three minifigures: Lloyd, Jay and Serpentine villain
LEGO Juniors NINJAGO brick building toys are compatible with all other LEGO construction sets for creative building
Lost Temple measures over 4” high, 6” wide and 6” long. Helicopter measures over 3” high, 4” long and 1” wide. Blue dragon measures over 1” high, 7” long and 9” wide.
Broadside measures over 1” high, 2” long and 1” wide. Miss Fritter measures over 2” high, 3” long and 2” wide
172 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 4 and 7 years old
